name: Notate
description: Jot your ideas, discoveries, research notes, or practically anything! Without leaving your browser! Enter Notate, your web navigation partner! Notate is a powerful browser extension that seamlessly integrates note-taking and web browsing.

features.name: Web navigation
features.description: Navigate the web efficiently with intuitive controls and features

features.name: Note-taking
features.description: Capture and organize your thoughts seamlessly while browsing

features.name: Web search
features.description: Search the web without interrupting your workflow

features.name: Web highlights
features.description: Highlight and save important information from any webpage

name: B2Brilliant
description: B2Brilliant's AI-driven outreach platform helps you identify qualified prospects, personalize campaigns, and boost conversion rates for your business development team.

features.name: AI-driven outreach
features.description: Leverage AI to create personalized outreach campaigns that resonate with prospects

features.name: Prospect identification
features.description: Identify high-value prospects using advanced targeting algorithms

features.name: Campaign personalization
features.description: Create customized campaigns that speak directly to your audience's needs

features.name: Conversion tracking
features.description: Monitor and optimize your campaigns with detailed conversion analytics

features.name: Agentic AI
features.description: Intelligent AI agents that assist with your daily tasks

features.name: Web navigation
features.description: Smart tools to improve your browsing experience

features.name: Navigation Partner
features.description: Enhance your workflow with our powerful navigation partner capabilities
